name: Eat The Trash (Android)
description:
Eat The Trash is a simple game about food!

Eat the most quantity of trash food you can to make as much points as you want!

But remember to avoid the healty food, or your hearts will start to go down

It's an infinite game, you can win points indefinetely

Get achievements, win different objects, and customize your character!

A good game to kill some time

Please, have in mind that Eat The Trash is only a game, for any reason you should eat on this way. Please, be healty

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

If you want, you can support me on patreon!
